start.title: The Crossroads
start.storyText: You are at a crossroads. A dark forest looms to the left, and a mysterious cave entrance is to your right.

forest.title: The Whispering Woods
forest.storyText: You are lost in the forest. You hear a strange noise and decide to run!

clearing.title: The Quiet Clearing
clearing.storyText: You find a clearing with a sparkling pond. Something shiny glimmers at the edge.

cave.title: The Glimmering Cave
cave.storyText: The cave walls sparkle with crystals. A narrow tunnel leads deeper inside.

treasureRoom.title: The Treasure Room
treasureRoom.storyText: You discover a hidden room filled with old relics. Among them lies a small chest.

win.title: The Chamber of Victory
win.storyText: You open the chest to find it brimming with gold and jewels. You have found the lost treasure â€” You win!
